attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.

attacks.name: Barrier
attacks.text: Discard 1 Energy card attached to Mewtwo in order to use this attack. During your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Mewtwo.

attacks.name: Hide in Shadows
attacks.text: Switch Gengar with one of your Benched Pokemon.

attacks.name: Double Scratch
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Pay Day
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, draw a card.

attacks.name: Fire Spin
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy cards attached to Charizard in order to use this attack.

attacks.name: Leech Seed
attacks.text: Unless all damage from this attack is prevented, you may remove 1 damage counter from Bulbasaur.

attacks.name: Ember
attacks.text: Discard 1 Energy card attached to Charmander in order to use this attack.

attacks.name: Hide in Shadows
attacks.text: Switch Gengar with one of your Benched Pokemon.
